page.title: 17Schools in our area
page.content: There are six schools in our block,Ashley Infants (including Plus One Group and Special Unit ), Ashley Junior, Fernhill Manor, Hordle Primary, New Milton Infants and New Milton Junior. Altogether 1152 children attend these schools. 89 members of staff teach and look after them. All the schools are for boys and girls and are day schools except Fernhill Manor which has some girls boarding. The age range of all the children is from 3-11 years inclusive. The Special Unit and the Plus One Group at Ashley teach children with learning difficulties. In the other schools, the number of boys and girls are about equal but in these two groups there are three times as many boys as girls.
